issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
In {{DatanodeManager#handleHeartbeat}}, it choose both pending replication list and pending EC list to up to {{maxTransfers}} items.

It should only send {{maxTransfers}} tasks combined to DN.
fields.summary: DatanodeManager picking EC recovery tasks should also consider the number of regular replication tasks.

comments.body: LGTM, possible to add a unit test too?
